Leiston Library

Manager: Gayla Rowling

Old Post Office Square, Main Street, Leiston
IP16 4ER

  • Tel: 01728 831252
  • Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk
  • Friends group: Leiston Town Council advisory group
  • Facebook

Room & venue hire

Room and space hire at Leiston Library →

Opening hours

Day Hours
Monday Closed
Tuesday 0930 – 1930
Wednesday Closed
Thursday 0930 – 1730
Friday 0930 – 1300, 1400 – 1700
Saturday 0930 – 1300, 1400 – 1700
Sunday 1000 – 1500

Branch facilities

  • Accessibility information
  • Payments: cash, cheques and cards accepted
  • Parking: available for one hour in front of the library, free parking available within walking distance
  • Out-of-hours book return available
  • Refreshments: coffee, tea and hot chocolate for sale
  • Which? available - ask staff for magazine or to log in
  • For sale: books of stamps
  • Also available: Art in the Library - exhibitions of local artists' work

IT and printing facilities

  • Free wifi
  • Book a computer
  • Borrow an iPad
  • Photocopying: available
  • Colour printing: available
  • Scan to email
  • Fax
  • Printing, photocopying & scanning charges

Regular events and activities

Children’s events

Baby Bounce

Thursday, 1030-1100

Soothing songs and gentle nursery rhymes for babies.

Find out more about Wordplay

Sally's Book Club: for under-12s

Thursday, 1530-1700

Drop in and have a cosy chat with Sally about your latest books. You might get a little reward for your reading efforts!

Reading groups

Sunday reading group

Sunday once a month, 1030-1130

Top Time reading group

first Tuesday of the month, 1100-1200

Arts, crafts & games

Art for Fun: Art group for adults

last Friday of the month, 1030-1200

Drop in and have fun creating things for enjoyment and wellbeing - no skill required! £1.50 charge to cover art materials.

Jigsaw puzzle group

Tuesday, 1030-1200

Add some pieces to our jigsaw puzzle while chatting and relaxing with others.

Merry Makers craft group for adults

second Saturday of the month, 1030-1200

Work on your latest project while chatting with other crafty people. Free refreshments.

Scrabble club

first Thursday of the month, 1400-1530

History

Family history drop-in

first Tuesday of the month, 1400-1600

Free help and guidance from experienced members of Alde Valley Suffolk Family History Group.

Upcoming special events

Short story competition for Leiston's Big Weekend

Thu 20 Feb, 2020 – Sun 3 May, 2020
